chara.textHome:
Greetings. I am Elisa Celjska, daughter of
Empress Barbara of the Holy Roman Empire!
Why do you look so shocked?

One must bear their name with pride,
no matter who they are.
My mother taught me that!

Her plain, simple trust in me,
though we only just met.
Such unshakable humility.
Darc has all the qualities I lack.

Exiled from the Imperial Palace,
I returned thanks to my magic.

The only one who'd talk to me
in that time was Uncle Oswald.

I see my weapons have improved
as much as I have!

Have my escapades on the battlefront
finally paid off?

I will use this power to clear
a way to the future!
I hold no stock in prophecies.

If all my battles until now were written
off as that, I couldn't handle it!

My mother, Empress Barbara,
had one wish: peace in Europe.

With my power and Darc's aid,
I can grant her wish.

My pride and the Holy Roman Empire's
Order of the Dragon count on it!
How do you do, are you well?
Ah, was that odd?

I merely wanted to greet you
as I do court nobles.
Mm? What is it...?
Oh?!

Morning already?
W-wait a moment!
I'll get changed and be right out the door!
Time for us to eat.

Now, now, don't stand on ceremony for me!
I fight alongside the Order of the Dragon.
I'm used to messy eaters.

I am the daughter of Barbara Celjska,
empress to the Holy Roman
Emperor Sigismund.

I am Elisa Celjska,
of the Order of the Dragon!
Glad to meet you.

What is it, Oswald? Honestly,
I told you  I was taking a bath... Hm?
Oh, it's you.
This must be really important then, yes?

I will rest up now, to prepare
for the battles ahead.

I have dedicated myself to the Holy
Roman Emperor...as well as my mother.

Magical Girls are gathering en masse,
as though drawn here by Darc.

Understandable, as this battle will
decide Europe's future...
All right! Enough fooling around!
Have you forgotten that this is a war zone?
You're starting to look sloppy.
Ready yourselves!

A foe is a foe, even if they take
the form of a Magical Girl.

I will blast them away,
in honor of the Dragons!

Please, you needn't call me "Princess".
Just "Elisa" will do.
We can put formalities aside...
I don't care for that kind of thing, anyway.
Hm? My weapon?
Oho!

Alchemical metallurgy grants it the power
of five rifles. A magic gun, given to me
by Per... an alchemist!

The mission my mother tasked the Order
of the Dragon with was clear:

Ascertain La Pucelle's power,
and aid her if it is genuine.

I am a Magical Girl because I met the
alchemist Pernelle and Qube.

I want to scold my younger self
for trusting them so easily!

Liz was born in Italy.
She called me "Principessa Elisa" once...
meaning "Princess Elisa".

I told her to stop, though.
It sounds so formal.

Melissa... You know, when I first fought
her she flung me right into the air!

Why, if I get a rematch,
I'll pay her back for that!
I am no princess.

I am the love child of my mother,
Empress Barbara...

To justify my existence,
I've been no stranger to battle.

Darc has always been willing
to fight selflessly for others,
she never falters or fades.
I respect that about her.

Y-you're saying...
"Monsieur Angel" is really Qube?!

There is nothing angelic about
that wretched little cheesecake!
I shall take care of this...with style!
No need to thank me.
It appears this match has been decided.
Das Ende! It's all over.

I'll use this power to make everyone
acknowledge me!
Now no one can rival my strength?
Y-you flatter me!
I see that you are skilled in your own right.
Impressive.

I face Melissa's wrath if I say the
slightest thing against Darc.

Plus I sense a certain homicidal
rage from Liz, too...
